---
title: "General Workflow for POLS 1600"
---

-   Before class on Tuesday

    -   Do the assigned readings

    -   Review last week's lab and slides

-   Tuesday: Come to class ready to engage with lecture and slides

-   Wednesday:

    -   Start the tutorials for that week

    -   Download, render, and skim Thursday's lab

-   Thursday: Come to class ready to work through that week's lab

-   Friday: Upload that week's tutorials to Canvas
